Text:
Is it possible to please upload the unmixed files OR at least teach me how to do the splitting of the tracks on a Mac?

*thanks in advance & for the uploads :)

Download XLD for Mac http://www.macupdate.com/app/mac/23430/x-lossless-decoder and open the .cue files with it. 

Then you'll be able to extract the individual songs!

why oh why the f$%^ do people rip in this format??? It is such a f%^&n' pain in the ass and so unnecessary ...grrrrr
Ever heard of a zip file????? We have gapless
